Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pb-CATH1 Python bivittatus  antimicrobial peptides peptide derivative
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28630199]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922)(MIC=2μg/ml);Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853)(MIC=3μg/ml);S. typhimurium (ATCC 14028)(MIC=1.5μg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 29213)(MIC>128μg/ml);B. cereus (ATCC 10876)(MIC=46μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28630199] 0% hemolysis at 4μg/ml against human red blood cell; 1.4 ± 0.4% hemolysis at 8μg/ml against human red blood cell; 5.1 ± 0.5% hemolysis at 16μg/ml against human red blood cell;7.3 ± 0.6% hemolysis at 32μg/ml against human red blood cell; 12.2 ± 0.7% hemolysis at 64μg/ml against human red blood cell
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Genomewide Analysis of the Antimicrobial Peptides in Python bivittatus and Characterization of Cathelicidins with Potent Antimicrobial Activity and Low Cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Kim D, Soundrarajan N, Lee J, Cho HS, Choi M, Cha SY, Ahn B, Jeon H, Le MT, Song H, Kim JH, Park C.
